completion: HyLabs(HyLite) is not supported with authentication domain having following configurations: authentication server - built-in, authorization server - built-in and user credentials for remote server - User provided credentials.  AD/LDAP based authentication configurations should be used.
Reservation Redeployment is getting stuck when snapshot setting is changed.
Daily reservation is shown to run after one month after editing (4 schedules are there with daily recurrence even past dates). Workaround: Update the schedules again.
Incorrect log is displayed for fix course self-study operation of powered off reserved VMs.
Self-study - Events that are not required to be logged are also logged.
No conflict occurs if Self-study is created simultaneously by the participant and admin.

With âReuse VMs..â disabled in reservation, course self-studies scheduled near to course reservation end-time may fail. Recommendation: Create self-studies after some time of course reservation end so that course reservation can be ended.
CSV import fails for Unicode file format.  Workaround: Use other supported formats like UTF-8, Shift-JIS etc.

Machine keys in IIS configuration for HyWorks web application resets on upgrade and login from HyLite results in error page 'Server Error in '/' Application.' => Error occurred during a cryptographic operation. Workaround: HyWorks Management Console web application Machine keys should be backed-up before upgrade and should be restored after the upgrade.

Schedule code accepts special character ` and Code validation error occurs if administrator continues to schedule reservation with provided code. Recommendation: The mentioned special character should not be used.
No warning or information of associated course self-study is shown while redeploying course reservation.

Course reservation with higher limits can be created if gold master is modified to reduce the previous allowed set limit.  Recommendation: Delete and recreate the Gold Master instead of modifying the existing one.
Audit announcement is shown to the users, even when inactive Workaround: Delete audit announcement if not needed.
Running reservation time can change after editing and re importing CSV. Recommendation: Do not update running reservations using CSV.
Unable to import users when realm name is mentioned in CSV.
Users not part of any course will not be able to access self-study reservations made by reservation admin for them.  Workaround: Create a dummy course for such users.
Allow Connect option works only when preparation time is higher than the allow connect time. Reservations must be in running state for allow connect function to work.

Pool creation types gets reset to 0 for RMS created desktop pools -> Leaves existing desktop pool, replica, resource pool as unmanaged. Recommendation: RMS desktop pools should not be altered from HyWorks Management Console.

Course Self-Study reservation option should not be present in management for assistant user.  Recommendation: This is a duplicate option in HyLabs screen for assistant user. If needed, add reservation option itself can be disabled for assistant user from HyWorks Management Console.
If RMS admin and the Participant creates Self-study for the conflicting time, Participant is unable to create more reservations.  Recommendation: Delete one of the self-study reservations for user.

If RMS admin creates one self-study for participant, participant's count for "Max Self-Studies Allowed" remains intact. Recommendation: Self-study should be initiated by end-users only and thus administrators should not create self-study reservations for them.
On deleting Reservation Pool manually, its resource pool does not get deleted from vCenter.   Recommendation: RMS desktop pools should not be altered from HyWorks Management Console.
"Number of connections exceeded" error is displayed in the Schedule tab instead of Self-Study Reservation.
CSV Import: Reservation is getting added, even when self-study enabled has duration set as 0.  Recommendation: Self-study duration should not be kept as 0 while being imported from CSV.
MMC and RMS service config details should be restored post upgrade.  Recommendation: Backup should be taken before upgrade for smooth and faster restoration of configurations.
Incorrect Japanese translation in Deployment options dialog. Recommendation: Use Chrome or Firefox for administration.
Course self-study is getting failed when "Assign network ready desktops" is enabled on Gold master.  Recommendation: Keep the flag as disabled in provisioning profiles.
Reservation should be highlighted using some mechanism if they have some recommended deployment options pending.
Admin, incharge can create self-study with same time as existing user self-study.
Calendar should show all reservation assigned to Participant/ Incharge / assistant.
Audio and Mic cannot be controlled from HyWorks Controller Connection Profiles in session from HyLite.  Workaround: Additional Command Line Params can be used
Course extension by admin are not reflected on calendar view and hence, course self-study can be created by admin in extended period of course reservation.
RMS logs-out user session though it has been disconnected from HyWorks Controller by admin.
In some cases, immediately after system start DVM agent may not get updated as powered-on due to failure in connecting to AccopsMQ.
Updating an existing schedule shows conflicts with expired schedule.  Workaround: Update schedule and change start date as today.
On changing default reservation settings, changes are not reflected on running self-study reservation
Are you sure you want to shut down the selected reservation? confirm action dialog box is not hidden and page is stuck.
Mail comes on start event even when the reservation is failed.
Importing .txt file via CSV Import results in Object reference error.
Extension is allowed for course reservation schedules which results in conflicting of schedules of same reservation.
Reservation status is not updated as failed when creation of VMs failed during redeploy.
Session change of connect is not updated if DVM Agent counters error like [#7802].

Timezone Issues: Reservation creation may not work correctly when users are working from different timezone as HyLabs portal displays current time of client machine whereas reservation scheduling uses server time for calculations.
[Gap/ Limitation for Kyoto] While creating self-study reservation, extension of existing reservation is not considered, Participant is able to add reservation in conflicting schedule
Refresh button is displayed for course default GM when only admin access flag is enabled
Numbering by RMS is not getting used for newly created VMs after deleting the VMs from the reservation.
Session change event for lock and unlock are not generated thus, max concurrent connection count is un-managed with Desktop concurrent connection check option as 1.
Agent status is not displayed for cloned VMs on reserved VMs wizard.
GM Limits will not get applied on existing reservations schedules post upgrade from v3.2 to v3.3.

Keeping End time of schedule1 and start time of schedule2 shows conflict e.g. two schedules (schedule1 ending at 5:30 and schedule2 starting at 5:30) cannot be created Workaround: Create schedule1 with end time as 5:29 or schedule2 with start date as 5:31.
Deployment setting are not considered for all kinds of GM limits.
Enter value less than 99999 validation message is not displayed for Max Active VMs field while adding gold master.
RMS: Incharge able to remove himself from the course.
Assistants can edit incharge list in reservation.
Disabling course self-study in course reservation settings after course self-study reservations creation, does not show any error and course self-studies are accessible.
[GAP] Object available through all applicable roles should be displayed for a user.
Sometimes even after logging out of RMS portal, the next logon with user having different role causes mix-up of roles and presents improper interface to user.
[Kyoto] Reservation edit should show the redeploy settings as saved from Gold Master.
Same CentOS and Ubuntu VDI gold master can be accessed by reservation admin, incharge, assistant.
Computer account deletion from AD will get failed if provisioning profile has been modified to use different domain user account.
Connect button gets enabled even when reserved VMs are still in configuring state.
Multi-Schedule reservation is not displayed properly in received mails as per in E-mail Notification Settings.
Deleting participant from self-study reservation created by admin, will come into effect only in next schedule.
